name: Like No One
content: Like no one  you take the pain away
Like the sun  lighting up my everyday
You are the sun  the only one
Like no one  you stay around for me
Like no one  you take the pain away
Like the sun  lighting up my everyday
You are the sun  the only one
Like no one  you stay around for me
Like no one  you take the pain away
Like the sun  lighting up my everyday
You are the sun  the only one
Like no one  you stay around for me
